txt.en: DNT - Not Used
DNT
The capture site can be found to the north-east of Celebros.\n\nYou should search the capture site for signs of the missing heirloom.
Celebros is located in the market east of Tol Ciryarani.\n\nYou should speak with Celebros.
The heirloom box is located near the reflecting pool of the capture site.\n\nYou should take the heirloom box.
Collected the lost heirloom
Talk to Celebros

'Somehow I knew you would return with it.\n\n'I know that it was selfish of me to ask you for help, but I know how much Faltharan wants us away from the war. It cannot replace what I've lost, but it can help me to forget... if only for a little while.'
You have searched the debris piles
The shimmering debris is located near the reflecting pool of the capture site.\n\nYou should examine the shimmering debris.
Examine the shimmering debris
You have searched the debris piles
Examine the shimmering debris
Clearing away the debris reveals an ash-stained lockbox
Search the area near the reflecting pool
Clearing away the debris reveals an ash-stained lockbox
Celebros, the wife of Lord Sirgon, lost a family heirloom during her capture. She has asked for your help in finding it.
A metallic shimmer underneath the debris catches your attention...
Searched the scattered debris ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'During the capture of the city, I lost an heirloom that has been in my family for longer than we can remember. It was the only thing I took with me when we fled Tol Ciryarani, and I cannot imagine leaving Pelargir without finding it.\n\n'Could you help me, [placeholder]? It would be located somewhere to the north of here, where a small band of us offered resistance against the Corsairs.'
Search the scattered debris ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lost in the Confusion
Collect the lost heirloom
